name: Dem Slippery Slopes
description:
Riding down the ski slopes on a wooden sledge, feeling the air pass by your ears and hearing the sounds of nature, what could be more relaxing? Wrong! You'd better collect the stuffed toys and dropped food in order to get as much money as possible and build bigger and faster sledges and race the biggest, steepest of slopes! 

Download the game and give it a try! Its easy to pick up, with only left and right control movement, and although its still in early development, is challenging at times!

Please be aware the 3rd level is not finished so if you open it, be prepared to fall off the world forever....
